EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for the Transformation Council in San Francisco on May 11–12
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save the Dates!
Pivotal is thrilled to be hosting another Transformation Council meeting in San Francisco on May 11–12 and we invite you to join us.
The Pivotal Transformation Council is an invite-only community for enterprise executives who are driving digital transformations within their organizations. The purpose of the council is to create a trusted forum where executives can come together regularly to learn, exchange ideas, and share their experiences with one another.
The event will kick-off with a private dinner the evening of May 11th, followed by a half day of transformation talks and a workshop on May 12th led by Eric Ries, author of The Lean Startup and The Leader’s Guide. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
Overview of the Agenda
Wednesday, May 11: Networking & Socializing 7:00 pm–10:00 pm Private dinner for Transformation Council members & attendees Location to be provided
Thursday, May 12: Transformation Talk & Workshop 8:00–8:30 am Breakfast
8:30–8:45 am Welcome remarks by Bill Cook and Edward Hieatt
8:45–9:45 am Eric Ries Talk: Trends in transformation, what companies can do to accelerate moving from the past to the future and how to break things down to MVP - how to “get small”
9:45–10:00 am Break
10:00–11:15 am Acceleration Workshop
11:15–11:45 am Standups (Let’s share what we’ve learned)
11:45am–12:00 pm Closing remarks by Eric Ries
12:00 pm Lunch Served (Boxed lunch provided for those traveling)
Location and details for the event will be provided shortly.
We look forward to you joining us. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
The Pivotal Transformation Team
